summary.span: 提供 3D 物件的一般化轉換支援。

span.span: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 3d 物件之間的轉換進行透過和方法，兩者都傳回物件。Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the and methods, both of which return a object. 3-D 之間的轉換物件可能由 4x4 矩陣的情況下，方法傳回的執行個體類別。In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the class. 可以轉換類別至和至。The class can transform a to a and a to a . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

returns.span: 如果已轉換 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if was transformed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於方法，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果轉換失敗。Unlike the method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
